o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:Name: mdde_Check_BusinessRuleHasAtLeastOneInputAttribute
o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:Creator: WesselsH1
o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:Comment: This should be on the level op mdde_BusinessRuleWithout mapping, but checks on that level are not visable in the modelcheck list.
o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:HelpMessage: This check ensures that every business rule has at least one input attribute
o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:OutputMessage: The following business rules have no attribute(s) with the input stereotype:
o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:CheckScript:
Function %Check%(obj) Dim boolResult, objAttribute boolResult = False For Each objAttribute In obj.Attributes If objAttribute.HasStereotype("mdde_InputAttribute") Then boolResult = True Exit For End If Next
%Check% = boolResult End Function
o:CustomCheckTargetItem.a:AutoFixScrpt:
Function %Fix%(obj, outmsg) ' Implement your automatic correction on <obj> here ' filling <outmsg> as you wish ' and return True if successful.
outmsg = "Automatic correction not implemented"
%Fix% = False End Function
